version_description:
■版本升级详情
・高品质活动「圣夜的圣诞派对」第一部
・「休憩之殿里卫依鲁」改装
・新手指引部分改修
・仓库扩张后的最大格数由1000变为1500
・挑战迷宫丶技巧对战丶进化迷宫画面显示的推荐等级改为推荐战斗力

[Update Contents List]
- Weapon avatar can be armed regardless of different types of weapons.
- Changes made to show the ranking according to battle ability from own character's profile page.

[Update Details]
・Begin displaying the Pack rates
※Some Free Packs, etc. will not be included.
・"Lotto Detail" button will be added on the Pack purchase screen
By tapping the button, the pages for the rates and etc. will be displayed.
・System SE will be added
The menu screen's maneuvering sounds, etc. of each of the System SE will be added.
※The volume of the System SE can be adjusted by "Option" > "Config" > "Sound" > "UI".

[Update Details]
・New class, "Summoner" added!
・New levels, "Floating Continents" added!
・Changes in separating with setting "Armor Set" and "Costume Set."
・Changes to rank from combat power for league mode's matching requirements.

[Update Details]
・Changes with more detailed item explanation in product list at the shop
※Pack products and other product line-up will be exception

[Bug Fixes]
- Recovery from malfunction with skill cool time's enhance effect
- Other small adjustments.

[Update Details]
- Implementation with new function "Max Boost" from "Rebirth."
- Changes in receiving "Defeat Point" when defeating the monsters.
- Changes in daily achievement from Number of defeat to Defeat Points for "Total Defeat."
- Changes in characters who are in Battle Ranking within 100 will display its ranking differently.
Bug fix.
[Bug Fixes]
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.
Please see notices within the game for more details about the update.

[Update Details]
- Adding Voice chat function
- Improvement to the malfunction of when operation stops while playing the game.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
- Implementing "ASOBIMO Phone Number Verification System."
- Recovery from malfunction of all of summoned monsters' attack effect show up although "Show Summoned Monster" is set-up other than "All."

[Bug Fixes]
- Malfunctions of some NPCs not being displayed.
- Malfunctions of not being able to control after purchasing items under certain circumstance.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
- Changes in not being able to be attacked for "5 seconds" for time to map to be displayed when moving to different map.
- "Quest Progress" function added to show the accepted quest name and the progress situation.
-- This function will be turned ON or Off from Menu>Option>Control>Mission

-"Auto Function" added to progress quest automatically.
-- Set-up "Display Progress" with accepted quest, and as you select "Quest Progress," "Auto function" will start
-- "Quest Progress" will be highlighted with background during auto
*Currently, auto function only correspond to some quests.
*For the quests not corresponded to this function, auto function will not be activated although "Quest progress" is selected.
*While auto function is activated during the battle, selected short cut numbered will be used automatically.
*Auto function will automatically terminate as bag's slots and weight are full.

- Recovery from malfunction when blacklisted characters use the skill "spiral thorn", thorn barriers are not displayed but still confined.
*Characters registered in blacklist will not be confined with "Spiral Thorn."

[Update Details]
Recovery from malfunction that character can not move during transfer countdown from "Return to Base" icon.

[Update Details]
- Adjustment to have lesser necessary materials for awakening weapons.
- Adjustment for maximum damage increase/decrease effect distributed for awakened weapons.
- Released character slots to 18.
- Released 4th ORB slot to Mevius Equipment.

[Update Details]
- Changes in showing the date of creating the character in the profile display.
- Changes in showing the date of creating the guild in the Guild display.
- Fix from malfunction that cannot proceed under certain condition during tutorial.
- Fix from malfunction of showing ORB slots other than equipment slots, when receiving rewards from challenge dungeon.

[Update Details]
- Added "Magi" in the Subcategory in the equipment enhancement display filter.
- Added "EXIT" button to move to Reception Map from Battle Map the in Tower Scramble.
- Fixing malfunction of showing Virtual Move Key/Button size in option with device display size smaller than 6 inch.

[Update Details]
- Added button to sell batch (all) of weapons and armors to NPC.
- Added function of selecting floors to teleport when owning a Tower Scramble.

[Update Details]
Change in display format for Help Book.

[Update Details]
- "AutoHunt"button added.
- Changes to items can be selected in batch when equipment enhanced, and guild point offered.

[Update Details]
- Change in showing the character on auto function, when there are characters who are on auto function in the same map.
- Change in automatically opening boxes all at once, when having two or more items.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
- Change of not showing the button for "Auto Hunt" in maps that can not use "Auto Hunt."
- Change with auto function still operates even when other windows for items etc. is shown.

[Update Details]
- Changes in able to opening all with box items that wasn't part of opening in batch.
- Fixed a malfunction of when items already received are shown overlapped at times, when items are all opened.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
"2nd Awaken Class" added!

[Update Details]
- Change in camera's original position to the center of your own character.
- Change in setting for "Item Drop Notification" will be "Rare only" as default.
-- Change setting from Menu>Option>Config>Control>＞Display and Notification.

[Update Details]
- Improvements made to some functions
- Small bug fixes.

TV anime "Demon Lord, Retry!" and Avabel Online Collaboration!!
Collaboration celebration event held at the same time
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
- New Farm floor "55F -Gaarden-" will be added.
- Event "Uninvited Guest" will be opened.
- Details of Resist Case will be changed.
- Items within the shared case will also be part of it when conducting slot release and others.
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

6th Anniversary Update
・Introducing the 6th Anniversary Map "Reminiscent Sea Palace"
・Limited Event being held
・Release of the new floor "Seabed Floor 54F"
・Release of the new skill for the 17 Awakened Classes
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
- Changed it so that a message will be displayed to notify the changes of the connectivity settings on the phone device, if the image of the profile icon, etc. cannot be changed

- Fixed the issue where the Submaster was not able to appoint guild members to becoming a Submaster from the Guild Member list screen
- Fixed the issue where the uploaded guild icon turned gray and was not displaying correctly under certain conditions
- Fixed the issue where the arms equipped to arms set was not able to crystallize to each case from the shared case for any of the characters of the same account

[Update Details]
- Change in able to receive selected all items from Shop Box.
- Change in showing opponents' information in PvP league.
- Change in able to select Chat's font size from "L・M・S."

[Update Details]
- Change in displaying UI for character name and guild name showing above the character.
- Change in able to equip the same part at the same time for Accessory Avatars.
* When multiple avatars are equipped at the same part, it will be displayed overlapped.

[Update Details]
- Change in transferring map from Revere to 1F -Sonaria- after finishing tutorial.
- Change in showing auto function on Friend display and Guild Member display.

[Update Details]
- Change in showing channel while party member is in auto-mode at Party Information display.
- Added random status and ORBs effect filter function for Crysta Cases' Crystallize display.

[Update Details]
- Fixed an issue of items in Crysta Case is not shown correctly when Crystallized while using filtering function.

[Update Details]
- Summoner 5th Adv Class "Ground Shaker" added!
- Renovated the UI for control.
- Changes in the letter limit for character name up to 14 halfwidth letters.

[Update Details]
- Fixed an issue of party member not showing in green on the mini-map.
- Fixed an issue of some letters shown overlapped at Party Information display.
- Fixed an issue of showing "1 ○○ Produced" when produced from recipe that has "〇〇x10."

[Update Details]
- Fixed an issue of not to have auto quest turned OFF when starting a auto quest to move to special map during auto quest.
- Added ""Use Gems to finish"" button on the quest accept display.

*Only for quests that can be cleared with Item ""Quest Guide."""

- Changed in showing items at selling, enhancing, and offering guild points display

-- Added ""Order"" list

-- Changed in showing details for ""Arm Info"" without switching.

*Due to showing the ""Arm Info"" without switching, ""Arm info"" button will be deleted.

- Fixed an issue of character name and guild name won't show up when you close the shop display from upper right icon.
- Fixed an issue of chat configuration is set to "Party" but it becomes "All Chats" when moving to map.
- Fixed an issue of NPCs and monsters' shadows not appearing when moving the map.

[Update Details]
- Changes in showing Suited BP when changing floors in the Main Tower.
- Changes in leaving the "recruit details" written before in the Guild Recruit board.

- Fixed an issue of not showing the time left over in Challenge Dungeon.
- Fixed an issue of other character's skill effect shows up, although "Show Skill Effect" is set for "Self only" in Option.

[Update Details]
- Added NPC to re-purchase items with certain limitation which you have sold before.
- Changes in icon size and layout for item list shown from storage and bag.
- Added recruiting limit according to battle power in Party Recruiting set-up.

[Update Details]
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
- Change in displaying UI for character name and guild name showing above the character.
- Change in able to equip the same part at the same time for Accessory Avatars.
* When multiple avatars are equipped at the same part, it will be displayed overlapped.

[Update Details]
- Christmas event starts!
- Corresponding to issues of character name, and guild names are not correctly shown under certain conditions.

[Bug fixes]
Issue of loading stops in the middle while app is started and at the loading screen.

[Update Details]
- Added 3rd Awaken Class.
- Unlocked level cap 280.
- Added ORB BOX in the sale line-ups for NPCs.

- Changes in lowered rank from 4 to 2 (number of stars) when Expert Evolved the Astra Arms and equipment level limit above 120's normal arms.
- Changes in showing all of line-ups in Advanced Item Shop and Advanced Gear Shop no matter the reached floors in Main Tower.

[Update Details]
- Change in ordering for "Friends" by online, offline, auto-run.
- Fixed an issue of not showing dealt damage and suffering damage when both damages occur at the same time.

[Update Details]
- Change in able to share Crysta Case and Element Case according to account.
- Change with color of the player shown on Mini Map for PvPs, such as Tower Scramble, classified more in detail from single color.

[Update Details]
Added a function where automatically reopens recruitment for party when a party member withdrawls and participants are less than the limit.
-- It will automatically appears with PT recruiting above a character when searching for party.

[Update Details]
- Change in able to receive selected all items from Shop Box.
- Change in showing opponents' information in PvP league.
- Change in able to select Chat's font size from "L・M・S."

[Big Update Details]
- Added new floor "Volcano"
- Newly added Class PvP League
-- Now able to get League Rewards from General League and Class League.
- Change in able to equip the equipments although the character hasn't reached to the level limit.
- Max Boost (requirement to unlock level cap) will be removed and changed to raise the level with EXPs.
　* The character's maximum level will separately exist.
- New daily achievement to get maximum of 16 Gems in a week stands permanently.

[Update Details]
- Fixed an issue of other display is shown overlapped by specific circumstance when using Creator's created skill.
- Fixed an issue of showing the wrong result from the original for result display when watching League.
- Fixed an issue of showing "General League" at the end of the battle for "Class League's" Practice Mode.

▼版本升级详情
・修正细微异常现象。

▼版本升级详情
・修正：于锻冶屋觉醒新星武具等固定属性的武具时，一览内将无法显示的异常现象
・修正：聊天房间内成员10人以上时，成员一览只能显示第1页的异常现象
・修正：从个人房间的便利功能选择美容时，画面显示突然消失的异常现象

[Big Update Details]
- 8th Summoner's Advanced Class, "Evil Force"
- Change in UI design for Main display.
- Changed the score showing the total damage during the League Battle.
- Added last week's battle record for League's Battle display.

[Update Details]
- Fix for the issue of control UI disappearred after returning after own character died while opening Menu screen under certain condition.
- Fix for the issue of showing time left for Skill Boost is different from what it supposed to be, under certain conditions.

[Update Details]
- Added the function to change the icon image for profile according to characters.
- Fixed an issue of not being able to invite Friend to the Party from Friend's profile screen.
- Fixed an issue of DP is not shown in own character's profile screen.

[Update Details]
- Added the function to delete profile icon.
- Added the function to set more details to show the Battle power information according to character.
- Added function to re-order to show Guild Member within the Guild Menu.
- Simplified the details shown on mini map at the Main screen.
- Fixed an issue of screen becomes darker when Battery Saving Mode is turned on.
Update Preparation

[Big Update Details]
- Added 4th Awaken Class
- Unlocked level cap 320
- Added new types of abnormal status
-- Added the arms, accessories, and cases for abnormal status resistance.
- Able to share Pets within all characters of 1 account.
- Added Pet Case to store Pet and to enhance the resistance.
- Added function to change the Guild's icon image.
- Changed the design for each menu screen.

[Update Details]
- Changed the display when skill being sealed by abnormal status.
- Changed that category can be filtered according to status in the Sharing Case.
- Showing the list of achievements failed to receive when receiving achievement reward items at once.
- Changed to be able to select the number when using Expansion for Pet Case and Resist Case.
- Added a function to be able to select guild icon display next to character name.
- Small bug fixes.

[Update Details]
Dealing the issue with disconnection during gameplay.

[Update Details]
- Changed the notice to be shown in the game when there are important notices.
- Changed to able to sell crystallized Pet in the Pet Case.

- Fixed an issue of not being able to give Pet food although having food in the Storage but not in Bag.
- Fixed an issue of items are all used under specific condition when item is selected to give to Pet.
- Fixed an issue of moving to wall or out of map when skill is activated at Battle Style Support.
- Fixed an issue of able to set up Battle-P beyond your own, when setting up Battle-P for Party Recruit.

[Update Details]
- Changed it so that a message will be displayed to notify the changes of the connectivity settings on the phone device, if the image of the profile icon, etc. cannot be changed

- Fixed the issue where the Submaster was not able to appoint guild members to becoming a Submaster from the Guild Member list screen
- Fixed the issue where the uploaded guild icon turned gray and was not displaying correctly under certain conditions
- Fixed the issue where the arms equipped to arms set was not able to crystallize to each case from the shared case for any of the characters of the same account

[Big Update Details]
- Added new floor "Trough"
- Event "Long Rain " starts
- Added 2 types for Male and Female Face Types (Total of 4 types)
- Added in-game BOX Pack to get Male and Female Character Voices.
- Added Avatar Contest
- Renewed the Daily to get maximum up to 16 Gems in 1 week.

Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Improving Avatar Contest]
・Showing a crown icon for the ranking 1st to 10th.
・Added character name in the profile screen
・Showing ranking of the opening period
・Added filter function according to character's gender.

Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
Added functions to be opened in the future.

[Big Update Details]
- New floor 53F -Reef- released
- ZENITH CLASH -Tree Soldier- released
- Display the 10 names that recently voted for your avatar on the avatar rankings
- Each skills of the Awaken Class adjusted and status adjustment of the summoned monsters
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

TV anime "Demon Lord, Retry!" and Avabel Online Collaboration!!
Collaboration celebration event held at the same time
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

6th Anniversary Update
・Introducing the 6th Anniversary Map "Reminiscent Sea Palace"
・Limited Event being held
・Release of the new floor "Seabed Floor 54F"
・Release of the new skill for the 17 Awakened Classes
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
・Event ongoing at the 6th Anniversary Map "Reminiscent Sea Palace"!
・Fixed multiple bugs when EX Skill "Fusion Summon: Divine Dragon" of the Awakened Class Emperor is used.
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
Continuing 6th Anniversary Event
Adding 2nd EX Skills for Awaken Class
Fixing other, small issues
Please check for more details regarding the update from in-game notices or from official website.

[Update Details]
Continuing 6th Anniversary Event
Adding 2nd EX Skills for Awaken Class

Fixing other, small issues

Integrating original bases and renewing the entire base
